summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Montlake Boulevard, from end of existing paving north of Pike's Reserve for canal, to Lake Washington Canal; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7969 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
